content: quick and easy halloween costume for your baby throw on a long-sleeved onesie and some tights and your baby is ready for trick-or-treating into the crisp fall air this pattern is for a newborn / 0-3 month old only size up using a larger hook and or bulkier yarn need about 150 yards of worsted weight yarn in cream orange and yellow sample made using spud & chloe sweater 1 happy halloween 1 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/spud--chloe-sweater
